author: Juergen Wiese
description: "The base of my cocktail are raw ingredients supplied naturally from the meadows that surround us. These components tell a story from the farm to the glass, representing a journey from the ancient to the present."
name: Meadow
recipeIngredient: 25 ml Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
Make camomile tea and mix with equal parts caster sugar
Allow to cool, bottle and store in the refrigerator
